meanings.definition: A person who is not a member of a minority group.
meanings.sent1: The school had a majority of nonminority students.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a nonminority in the diverse neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The nonminority of cats in the house outnumbered the dogs.
meanings.sent4: In the land of birds, the nonminority of penguins stood out.
meanings.sent5: The nonminority of trees in the forest were oak trees.

meanings.sent1: The nonminority group had a strong presence in the community.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to be part of the nonminority population.
meanings.sent3: The nonminority color of the car made it easy to spot in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: Her nonminority status in the club gave her a unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The nonminority opinion was heard loud and clear in the meeting.
